title: Bailey Beats the Blah
description: Bailey hates his new school. He has no friends. His dog Fuzzy slobbers all over him. BLAH! How can Bailey change his BLAH to HA-HA-HA! Empowers children to beat worry thoughts and sad days. Bailey is an empowering mental health picture book for children 4-8 years, spring-boarding discussion on emotions and action plans on how to lift a child's mood. Self-esteem and resilience skills for children, families, teachers, parents and counselors. Supported by Kids Help Line and aligned with Kids Matter education program.Kids activities and Teacher notes will be available on the website - karentyrrell.com - soon!
author: Karen Tyrrell
